name: Barisieur
slogan: Barisieur is a premium coffee and tea brewing alarm clock
description: The Barisieur is a premium alarm clock that eases you into your morning with the soothing sounds of bubbling water along with the smell of the freshly brewed coffee or loose leaf tea.

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Are you looking to get a taste of what it’s like to work for an up-and-coming London hardware startup?


Well look no further! We at Barisieur are searching for the newest member of the Bari-Family.


The Pitch:


We sell a premium Coffee & Tea brewing alarm clock (www.barisieur.com), which has been voted coolest product of the year by Financial Times, GQ, Vogue, Forbes, Elle and many more.


You might have seen our Kickstarter/ Indiegogo 2 years ago which was voted Kickstarter project of the year and raised the second highest amount in the UK ($800K). Since then we have sold over 4000 Bari's to 52 countries and are now selling in over 15 retail stores including Harrods, Selfridges, Conran Store, Urban Outfitters (US), Neiman Marcus (US), Le Bon Marche (Paris) etc. in the UK & USA and our sales have been increasing over 300% month on month! 


———-> Anyways, enough patting ourselves on the back... here's why we need YOU!


We are looking for a general marketing legend to help us with our daily activities so that we can take this baby to the next level! Our B2B/retail channel has been expanding rapidly, but we have been struggling to bring down the cost per acquisition to a profitable level on the B2C side, mainly because both founders have no background in marketing.


Key skills:


*1-2 years Digital advertising experience required. We need you to be able to take on all things digital and drive traffic to our website to convert at a low CPA. You don't need to know everything, two years of prior experience with a strong academic record should do the trick

*You need to be well versed on all social media platforms (Facebook business manager, Instagram, Google analytics etc.) and know how to set up adverts. Ideally you will have knowledge of how to edit content and target audiences making micro changes, A&B testing adverts, basically spicing things up until you find that secret formula!

*Analytical skills: The role calls for the continual analysis of market trends and the positioning of competitors.

*Video/ photo editing skills (preferred) - We believe that the best way to improve CPA is to make lots of changes to content until things work. A video that works in one country might need to be re-cut to work in another. 

*Working to become our head of marketing. If you're really good we want you to grow into this role to run marketing across the whole business.



Responsibilities


*Develop & oversee the marketing strategy, inbound marketing strategy, affiliate marketing strategy, Retention marketing strategy and Communication plan for b2c.
*Run adverts across all digital channels, consider non-digital if applicable.
*Execute ideas to materially impact revenue goals with the aim of driving growth fast.
*Refine the organization’s social media strategy
*Manage and measure marketing campaign costs
*Report on the effectiveness of marketing campaigns using pre-determined KPIs


Benefits:
*LOVE what you do and do what you love!
*Potential Equity incentive - work for yourself and be you own boss!
*Fast past start-up environment with free coffee/ biscuits & Free Beer/Cider in the lovely WeWork London Fields
Develop unique experience working for an up-and-coming premium lifestyle brand and experience first hand the blood, sweat and tears (of joy) it takes

Got what it takes? Drop us a line on markus@barisieur.com outlining 1) why you’re a general marketing legend and 2) Why you want you to want to join this co. and 3) How you think you can take this business to the next level. Along with your CV and Portfolio if you have a design background.


Look forward to you application!
